sqlMap.insert:
insert into classtable(idUserTable, idStyleTable, classStartDate, classEndDate, classStartTime, classEndTime, classDays) values (#idUserTable#, #idStyleTable#, #classStartDate#, #classEndDate#, #classStartTime#, #classEndTime#, #classDays#)
select last_insert_id() as idUserTable
sqlMap.select: select * from classtable as c join styletable as s where c.idStyleTable = s.idStyleTable

select c.idClassTable, c.classStartDate, c.classEndDate, c.classStartTime, c.classEndTime, c.classDays, s.styleName, u.userFirstName, u.userLastName from classtable as c join styletable as s ON (c.idStyleTable = s.idStyleTable) JOIN usertable as u where u.idUserTable = c.idUserTable
select max(idClassTable) as idClassTable from classtable;
